definition: Describing something that elicits a strong sense of admiration, astonishment, or awe due to its remarkable qualities or impact. It is commonly used to express the overwhelming or striking nature of an object, event, achievement, or performance.

examples.english: The movie had impressive special effects.

examples.german: Die Aussicht von hier oben ist beeindruckend.
examples.english: The view from up here is breathtaking.

examples.german: Er hat eine beeindruckende Leistung erbracht.
Die Architektur des Geb√§udes ist beeindruckend.
examples.english: The architecture of the building is impressive.
